Name: Coolman Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Harmonious apple and zesty orange laced with vodka.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2001 by Jack Coleman at The Library Bar , Lanesborough Hotel, London, England. Our recipe amended in November 2020 with thanks to feedback by Kjell Eriksson.
Nutrition: One serving of Coolman Cocktail contains 134 calories
